channel.title: My resignation
channel.description:
It's time to say goodbye to Minecraft. It's been a fun ride (and the euphoria reminiscing those first few months of the server still gives me butterflies), but it's time to move on from this game. I was planning on sticking around just to provide input on the goings-on around here and to try to voice the opinions of people that have the same views as me and don't say anything, but I think it's time to admit defeat and just let you guys have the server to stop all the fighting :P
I would like to nominate zuppers to take my place alongside Moparisthebest and Tom as one of the trinity of administrators. He is a great Minecraftar and an active Moparcraftian.
This will leave an open Mod staff slot, which is the perfect reason to have Tarkoff fill it in.

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I have a feeling you’ll be back.

Read full topic

Tom_BETA:

Good bye Sylvester

Read full topic

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Good bye Sylvester

Good luck with CR as well.

Read full topic

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

If I ever feel like playing again I’ll probably just start up my own vanilla server like people were suggesting, but I doubt that will happen for a while

Read full topic

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Pity you’re going, you know there is such a thing as an ‘extended break’. It’s what I’ve been on for the last while and will continue to be on for the next 5 months. Although I still do occasionally pop my head in when I get the time. You never know, you may get the sudden urge to play minecraft in the future… my attempt at convincing you to not quit

Read full topic

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Right now it really just is a title It used to be for things like WorldEdit, spawning, etc.

Anyways, good luck with the server guys

Read full topic

item.title: My resignation
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Never really understood the administrator title. Sad to see you go tho. It looks like your quitting your position and the game
I wish the server was more active.

Read full topic
